item.title: About
item.description:
$ whoami

My name is Ouahabs (ouahabs for aesthetic purposes), short for Abdelouahab, a 1st year Computer Science student at The Higher School of Computer Science -Sidi Bel Abbes-. (a.k.a ESI SBA)

Cyber Security

I got interested in Cyber security shortly after enrolling, and i’ve started digging here and there learning this and that and now i’m trying to learn more through participating in CTFs and playing various security challenges on various websites.

This Website

This website is basically meant to be some sort of personal blog where i can document my learning progress and to share whatever it i want to share, this website was built using Hugo, along with the theme KeepIt and some slight adjustment. I wrote two Write-ups before creating this on Medium, then i heard about this “quick” framework so i decided to give it a try.
